title: Six Key Takeaways from the OMB Memo
description: In May 2021, following a number of high-profile security incidents, U.S. President Biden issued an executive order that set out a high-level agenda to modernize and improve the government?s cyber resilience. This January, the U.S. Office of Management and Budget (OMB) issued a memo to the heads of executive departments and agencies that gave much more detail on how the U.S. government will move toward Zero Trust security principles.
author: Jim Black
